name: SONIC: THE OFFENDERS
description:
sonic and friends have gone to prison for breaking the law!! They have to do time, but that's to damn slow!!! So play as Tails, Sonic or Knuckles (maybe Amy in a future update) and get out of prison while avoiding the robot guards! COLLECT ALL THE RINGS TO WIN!!!!!

(this game is in its alpha stages and i have not programmed a way to win yet ;-; I am working on it! :D)
